body_content.explanation: an opening or a device that allows fresh air to come into a closed space:
examples: The bathroom had no window but it had an electric ventilator.

body_content.explanation: a machine that helps people breathe when they have difficulty breathing on their own, by forcing air in and out of their lungs:
examples: He was brought into intensive care shortly after the accident and immediately put on a ventilator.
Three days after surgery, she was taken off the ventilator, but had to go back on it a day later.
Early reports found death rates as high as 90% among COVID-19 patients on ventilators.
He was still in a critical ward, still breathing through a ventilator and still without feeling in any of his limbs.
